game.description:
The Jar Game & Chaos includes two educational games:
  • The Jar Game: The game presents the player with two jars which include a different amount of bonbons (green) and lumps of sugar. The player controls a fly and needs to enter one of the jars and land on a piece of sugar. The game's goal is to teach the kid to recognise which jar has the biggest probability of success.
  • Chaos: The player is presented with a field which contains a number of different shapes and colours. The game specifies a shape and colour and the player needs to catch as many identical items by moving a space ship over the field. During the game, the target may be changed.
game.name: The Jar Game & Chaos
